docs.snippet: Macy Miller scored a career-high 20 points and South Dakota State upset No. 25 Arkansas 80-75 in overtime on Thursday night....

headline.print_headline: South Dakota St. Tops No. 25 Arkansas 80-75 in OT

docs.lead_paragraph: Macy Miller scored a career-high 20 points and South Dakota State upset No. 25 Arkansas 80-75 in overtime on Thursday night.

docs.snippet: General Motors Co's Cadillac aims to increase its global annual sales to over 500,000 cars by 2020, a senior executive said on Friday....

docs.snippet: Thailand's King Bhumibol Adulyadej canceled a public appearance on his 87th birthday on Friday on the advice of doctors, disappointing thousands camped outside the hospital hoping for a glimpse of the world's longest-reigning monarch....

headline.main: Thai King Cancels 87th Birthday Appearance on Doctors' Orders
headline.print_headline: Thai King Cancels 87th Birthday Appearance on Doctors' Orders

docs.lead_paragraph: Thailand's King Bhumibol Adulyadej canceled a public appearance on his 87th birthday on Friday on the advice of doctors, disappointing thousands camped outside the hospital hoping for a glimpse of the world's longest-reigning monarch.

docs.snippet: A traditional birthday celebration ceremony for Thailand's King Bhumibol Adulyadej, the world's longest-reigning monarch, was canceled Friday because his doctors said he's not well enough to attend....

headline.main: Birthday Ceremony for Ailing Thai King Canceled
headline.print_headline: Birthday Ceremony for Ailing Thai King Canceled

docs.lead_paragraph: A traditional birthday celebration ceremony for Thailand's King Bhumibol Adulyadej, the world's longest-reigning monarch, was canceled Friday because his doctors said he's not well enough to attend.
